```{r libs, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
obs <- readRDS("data/observations.rds")
```

# How many different bird 

```{r}
sp_bydate <- obs %>% 
  group_by(birdingDt, locName) %>% 
  summarise(
    num_species = n()
  ) 
  
```

```{r}
sp_bydate %>% 
  group_by(locName) %>% 
  count()
```


```{r}
sp_bydate %>% 
  filter(str_detect(locName, 'Draper'))
```

```{r fig.width=12}
sp_bydate %>% 
  filter(str_detect(locName, 'Draper')) %>% 
ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = birdingDt, y = num_species, fill = locName)) 
```
